text: David Harewood MBE (born 8 December 1965) is an English actor. He is known for playing David Estes in the Showtime series Homeland. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Birmingham Category:Black British actors Category:English movie actors Category:English stage actors Category:English television actors Category:English voice actors
title: David Harewood
